data.name: Angie, Personal AI Assistant with Telegram Voice and Text

options.timeMin: ={{$fromAI("date","the date after which to fetch the messages in format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS")}}

filters.receivedAfter: ={{$fromAI("date","the date after which to fetch the messages in format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS")}}

options.systemMessage:
=You are a helpful assistant.

Today's date is {{ $now }}.

Guidelines:
- When fetching emails, filter out any promotional emails. 
- When summarizing emails, include Sender, Message date, subject, and brief summary of email.
- if the user did not specify a date in the request assume they are asking for today
- Use baserow tool to answer questions about tasks
- When answering questions about calendar events, filter out events that don't apply to the question.  For example, the question is about events for today, only reply with events for today. Don't mention future events if it's more than 1 week away

parameters.toolDescription: Useful for getting contact information.  For example emails or phone numbers.

parameters.content:
## [Video Tutorial](https://youtu.be/pXjowPc6V2s)
@[youtube](pXjowPc6V2s)


## Overview
Meet Angie - your personal AI assistant that handles voice & text via Telegram to manage your digital life.

**To get started:**

1. **Connect all credentials** (Telegram, OpenAI, Gmail, etc.)
2. **Activate the workflow** and message your Telegram bot:
   • "What emails do I have today?"
   • "Show me my calendar for tomorrow"
   • "Craete new to-do item"
   • 🎤 Send voice messages for hands-free interaction

## Questions or Need Help?

For setup assistance, customization, or workflow support, join my Skool community!

## [AI Automation Engineering Community](https://www.skool.com/ai-automation-engineering-3014)

Happy learning! -- Derek Cheung

Video Tutorial


 

Overview

Meet Angie - your personal AI assistant that handles voice & text via Telegram to manage your digital life.
 
To get started:
 

Connect all credentials (Telegram, OpenAI, Gmail, etc.)
Activate the workflow and message your Telegram bot:
• “What emails do I have today?”
• “Show me my calendar for tomorrow”
• “Craete new to-do item”
• 🎤 Send voice messages for hands-free interaction
 
Questions or Need Help?

 
For setup assistance, customization, or workflow support, join my Skool community!
 

AI Automation Engineering Community

 
Happy learning! – Derek Cheung

text_blocks.text:
Meet Angie - your personal AI assistant that handles voice & text via Telegram to manage your digital life.
 
To get started:
For setup assistance, customization, or workflow support, join my Skool community!
I can answer most questions about building workflows in n8n.
For specific tasks, you’ll see the Ask Assistant button in the UI.

options.timeMin: ={{$fromAI("date","the date after which to fetch the messages in format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS")}}

filters.receivedAfter: ={{$fromAI("date","the date after which to fetch the messages in format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS")}}

options.systemMessage:
=You are a helpful assistant.

Today's date is {{ $now }}.

Guidelines:
- When fetching emails, filter out any promotional emails. 
- When summarizing emails, include Sender, Message date, subject, and brief summary of email.
- if the user did not specify a date in the request assume they are asking for today
- Use baserow tool to answer questions about tasks
- When answering questions about calendar events, filter out events that don't apply to the question.  For example, the question is about events for today, only reply with events for today. Don't mention future events if it's more than 1 week away

parameters.toolDescription: Useful for getting contact information.  For example emails or phone numbers.

parameters.content:
## [Video Tutorial](https://youtu.be/pXjowPc6V2s)
@[youtube](pXjowPc6V2s)


## Overview
Meet Angie - your personal AI assistant that handles voice & text via Telegram to manage your digital life.

**To get started:**

1. **Connect all credentials** (Telegram, OpenAI, Gmail, etc.)
2. **Activate the workflow** and message your Telegram bot:
   • "What emails do I have today?"
   • "Show me my calendar for tomorrow"
   • "Craete new to-do item"
   • 🎤 Send voice messages for hands-free interaction

## Questions or Need Help?

For setup assistance, customization, or workflow support, join my Skool community!

## [AI Automation Engineering Community](https://www.skool.com/ai-automation-engineering-3014)

Happy learning! -- Derek Cheung

options.systemMessage:
=You are a helpful assistant.

Today's date is {{ $now }}.

Guidelines:
- When fetching emails, filter out any promotional emails. 
- When summarizing emails, include Sender, Message date, subject, and brief summary of email.
- if the user did not specify a date in the request assume they are asking for today
- Use baserow tool to answer questions about tasks
- When answering questions about calendar events, filter out events that don't apply to the question.  For example, the question is about events for today, only reply with events for today. Don't mention future events if it's more than 1 week away

Overview

Meet Angie - your personal AI assistant that handles voice & text via Telegram to manage your digital life.
 
To get started:
 

Connect all credentials (Telegram, OpenAI, Gmail, etc.)
Activate the workflow and message your Telegram bot:
• “What emails do I have today?”
• “Show me my calendar for tomorrow”
• “Craete new to-do item”
• 🎤 Send voice messages for hands-free interaction
 
Questions or Need Help?

 
For setup assistance, customization, or workflow support, join my Skool community!
